Instruction: Scrub the beets and trim off the tops and roots. Peel if desired.
Cut the beets into wedges or cubes and place them on a baking sheet.
In a small bowl,  whisk together balsamic vinegar, honey, and olive oil.
Drizzle the balsamic mixture over the beets and toss to coat evenly.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the beets are tender, stirring halfway through cooking.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Garnish with chopped fresh thyme before serving.
Enjoy warm as a tangy and sweet side dish.
